Package edu.washington.cs.touchfreelibrary.sensors

Interface Summary
CameraGestureSensor.Listener To receive messages from CameraGestureSensor, classes must implement the CameraGestureSensor.Listener interface.
ClickSensor.Listener Listener for classes that derive from ClickSensor.
 

Class Summary
AccelerometerClickSensor Class AccelerometerClickSensor looks for sudden perturbations in the z-axis of the accelerometer to detect clicks.
CameraGestureSensor CameraGestureSensor takes input data from the camera and uses that to sense four gesture commands: up, down, left, and right.
ClickSensor Class ClickSensor is an abstract base class to all other click sensors.
MicrophoneClickSensor Listen for amplitude spikes coming from the microphone to detect clips.
MotionDetectionReturnValue Only used within the package to get data from JNI.
